author: Johnny

review: Perhaps once all the bugs are worked out it will be alright. My experience living in Maine with DSL is that I cannot get the 'Help' vids to play that came installed. Things never stop 'loading'. I purchased a fireplace app for Christmas and after spending half an hour or so trying to get it to work I moved on frustrated. I noticed yesterday that a couple of the 11 screen options are working but still not all. Looks awesome but lacks functionality. Trying to find the options for importing local files (without buying additional items - an android operating system driven device smartphone or tablet) is impossible without something like another expense purchasing an app like PLEX. If I had dumped cable or sat for this I'd be bumming for sure. Hoping for brighter days ahead. I hear the Fire box is a good product - but that is not the one I have.
